message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $9,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable and I can't go as low as $9,000. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  $10,000 is closer, but I'm aiming for something a bit more budget-friendly. Could we do $9,500?
